string.value: #b#p1012109##k of #b#m100000000##k in Victoria Island has apparently started writing a book.
#p1012109# of #m100000000# has requested my help in writing his book. For more information, he recommended me to talk to #b#p2041022##k in #b#m220000400##k of Ludibrium. Should I go there...?
#b#p2041022##k asked me to look for some subjects worthy of writing a book on. I should talk to him when the research is over.

Thank you so much for bringing that Maple History Book the other day. Actually since then, #p2041022# asked me if I could compile some data missing from the history book and write a new book on it. Ah! This is going to be a long story, so please be seated.

Well, I've run into a problem here. I was able to compile enough data for the missing information on Book 1 and 2 for the new book, but Book 3... the book on Monsters. That's the one I'm still terribly lacking on.
It's a stretch to find every single information from the book, and ... I would really love to face them myself, if only I could, but I'm not strong enough to face them.
Can you please help me out here? I would personally like to request a little help from you, for the sake of the book.
Thank you so much! I'm currently researching the doll monsters, but I have no clue exactly which monster I'm supposed to study on. I'm sure someone like #b#p2041022##k may give you an advise on this.
Please meet #b#p2041022##k at #b#m220000400##k of Ludibrium, and ask him what I should research on.
I see... then do you have someone you can recommend? Please help me... if only I was strong enough to take on the monsters myself...
Ahhh, you're the one with the History Book ... it's been a while. Good seeing you. What? #b#p1012109##k is struggling to write a book as we speak?

Doll monsters? Well, you'll find some at the Eos Tower. I don't know exactly which one will help him write his book. Alright, I'll look for some information on this. Can you give me some time? Talk to me later, okay?
If you go see #b#p2041022##k, he may give you helpful advice about this.
